## mod variable

Create a consistent cross platform modifier string pattern.

This can be used with the pressKeyWithModifier.

```ts
mod('Primary', 'A')
// => 'Control-A' // on PC
// => 'Cmd-A' // on Mac

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mod: (modifier: "Alt" | "Shift" | "Primary" | "PrimaryShift" | "PrimaryAlt" | "Secondary" | "Access" | "Ctrl" | "CtrlShift" | "ShiftAlt", key: string, isMacFn?: () => boolean) => string
```
